trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>Dissatisfied with the name “<var 29 EA02 /var>”? I understand. Pray allow me to review your registration...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_002_02<tab>A fee of 2,000 gil is required for each name change.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_RENAME_Q1<tab>Change your race chocobo's name to <var 2B EA02 /var> for <var 22 E803 ((,)) /var> gil?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_RENAME_DONE<tab>Excellent choice, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. I think all here would agree that <var 29 EA02 /var> is a far better name.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_TALK_ACTOR<tab>Dissatisfied with your race chocobo's name? I understand. Pray allow me to review your registration...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_001_01<tab>Beg your pardon, but did I misunderstand your request? I can find no record of a race chocobo currently registered to you...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_001_02<tab>You can only change the name of a registered race chocobo.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_002_01<tab>I do not wish to embarrass you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but it seems you lack the requisite gil...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_003_01<tab>Ah... Forgive me, but it seems that the name you requested is... How shall I put this? Ineligible.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_003_02<tab>The word combination you selected is prohibited. Please select a different name.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACERENAME_00231_ERROR_004_01<tab>Then you wish to retain your race chocobo's current name, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Very well.
